oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lettter from [James B. Owen] to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Partial letter from Pvt. James B. Owen, Co. D, 31st Ill. Inf. Regt., USA to his father. He writes that he is very tired and apologizes for any poor writing and spelling. They have been guarding prisoners and he asks that his father; write soon and give him all the news. Owen was from Brownsville, Ill. and died Sept. 3, 1863.
